file.content:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ServiceAccount
metadata:
  name: podlabel-reciever
---
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  name: podlabel-reciever
rules:
  - apiGroups: [""]
    resources: ["pods"]
    verbs: ["get", "list", "update", "patch"]
  - apiGroups: ["authentication.k8s.io"]
    resources: ["tokenreviews"]
    verbs: ["create"]
---
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRoleBinding
metadata:
  name: podlabel-reciever
roleRef:
  apiGroup: rbac.authorization.k8s.io
  kind: ClusterRole
  name: podlabel-reciever
subjects:
  - kind: ServiceAccount
    name: podlabel-reciever
    namespace: default
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: podlabel-reciever-config
data:
  config.yaml: |
    account:
      - "system:serviceaccount:default:podlabel-reciever"
    label: transportlogs
---
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: podlabel-reciever
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: podlabel-reciever
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: podlabel-reciever
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: podlabel-reciever
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65532
        fsGroup: 65532
      containers:
        - name: manager
          image: localhost/controller:latest
          ports:
            - containerPort: 9999
              name: webhook
          imagePullPolicy: Never
          securityContext:
            allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
            capabilities:
              drop:
                - ALL
            readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          resources:
            limits:
              cpu: 500m
              memory: 128Mi
            requests:
              cpu: 10m
              memory: 64Mi
          volumeMounts:
            - name: config
              mountPath: /config.yaml
              subPath: config.yaml
              readOnly: true
      volumes:
        - name: config
          configMap:
            name: podlabel-reciever-config
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: podlabel-reciever
spec:
  selector:
    app: podlabel-reciever
  ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 8080
      targetPort: 9999

file.content:
---
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: Role
metadata:
  namespace: default
  name: pod-updater
rules:
  - apiGroups: [""] # "" indicates core API group
    resources: ["pods"]
    verbs: ["get", "update"]
---
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  name: tokenreviews
rules:
  - apiGroups: ["authentication.k8s.io"]
    resources: ["tokenreviews"]
    verbs: ["create"]
---
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: RoleBinding
metadata:
  namespace: default
  name: pod-updater-binding
subjects:
  - kind: ServiceAccount
    name: default
    namespace: default
roleRef:
  kind: Role
  name: pod-updater
  apiGroup: rbac.authorization.k8s.io
---
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRoleBinding
metadata:
  namespace: default
  name: tokenreview
subjects:
  - kind: ServiceAccount
    name: default
    namespace: default
roleRef:
  kind: ClusterRole
  name: tokenreviews
  apiGroup: rbac.authorization.k8s.io

input.content:
apiVersion: v2
name: alert-label-receiver
description: A Helm chart for alertLabelReceiver - handles alerts and updates pod labels
type: application
version: 0.1.0
appVersion: "1.0.0"

nameOverride: ""
fullnameOverride: ""

image:
  repository: localhost/controller
  pullPolicy: Never
  tag: "latest"

serviceAccount:
  create: true
  name: "podlabel-reciever"

replicas: 1

namespace: default

security:
  runAsNonRoot: true
  runAsUser: 65532
  fsGroup: 65532
  allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  readOnlyRootFilesystem: true

resources:
  limits:
    cpu: 500m
    memory: 128Mi
  requests:
    cpu: 10m
    memory: 64Mi

service:
  type: ClusterIP
  port: 8080
  targetPort: 9999

config:
  account:
    - "system:serviceaccount:default:podlabel-reciever"
  label: "transportlogs"

rbac:
  create: true
  clusterRole:
    rules:
      - apiGroups: [""]
        resources: ["pods"]
        verbs: ["get", "list", "update", "patch"]
      - apiGroups: ["authentication.k8s.io"]
        resources: ["tokenreviews"]
        verbs: ["create"]

content.text:
Created Helm chart for alertLabelReceiver at `alertLabelReciever/helm-chart/`. The chart includes:

- **Chart.yaml**: Chart metadata
- **values.yaml**: Configurable values for image, resources, RBAC, etc.
- **templates/**: Kubernetes manifests as Helm templates
  - `serviceaccount.yaml`: Service account creation
  - `rbac.yaml`: ClusterRole and ClusterRoleBinding
  - `configmap.yaml`: Configuration for the application
  - `deployment.yaml`: Application deployment
  - `service.yaml`: Service to expose the application
  - `_helpers.tpl`: Template helpers for consistent naming

The chart parameterizes all key values like image repository, resources, RBAC permissions, and configuration while maintaining the same functionality as the original manifests.
